messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 895- vent & info request
messages.msgSnippet: ... Paige have you or your husband read John Holt s Learning All the Time . I m reading it now and it s a real eye opener, as a new unschooler coming from
messages.messageBody:
Paige wrote:

>Our argument was about him trying to "teach" the girls things ALL THE
>FREAKIN TIME...He had the audacity to ask me what
>curriculum I was buying for next year. GGGRRRR. lol

Paige have you or your husband read John Holt's "Learning All the Time".
I'm reading it now and it's a real eye opener, as a new unschooler coming
from teaching in PS for 7-8 yrs. I actually plan to recommend it to some of
my open-minded teacher friends. Anyway it's been really great about letting
me know how children will learn reading, writing, arithmetic, etc. just
through their everyday experiences. I plan on having my husband read it
once I'm done.

Misty



________________________________________________________________________
